about_the_game:
Game Introduction

Collect parts, build your workshop, start production, and dive into trade!

In Scrapworks Simulator, you begin as a scrap collector on a journey to establish a large production workshop. Explore your surroundings to find parts hidden on the ground, in factories, and in abandoned places. Assemble the parts you've gathered in your workshop to create products. Prepare molds, mass-produce items in the foundry, and sell your products in bulk.

Master specializations such as Mold Master or Foundry Worker, offering your services to other Steam players in exchange for money. You can purchase the necessary machinery, post service ads, and even hire services from other players.

  • An active trading system exists among players; sell your products to others, form business partnerships, or take on custom orders.

In this social trading world, you can visit workshops established by other players, get inspired, and develop your own workshop. Expand your workshop, secure your position in the market, and transform into a production master!

  • From Collector to Top Producer!: Begin the game as a simple scrap collector.

  • Collect Parts: Explore the environment to find parts hidden on the ground, in factories, or in abandoned zones.

  • Set Up Your Workshop: Build facilities like an assembly shop, hardware workshop, foundry, etc., in a location of your choice.

  • Craft: Combine the parts you’ve collected in your workshop to create functional tools and objects.

  • Begin Production: Prepare molds and start mass production in the foundry, selling your products in bulk.

  • Sell Your Products: Display your products at a stand or post them online for sale.

  • Show Off Your Wealth: Display rare items in a special showcase for players visiting your workshop to see your wealth!

  • Organize Your Shop

  • Assemble the Parts
